question.title: springboot otlp telemetry turn off
question.body:
I am using micrometer based otlp for enabling opentelemetry in springboot.

implementation 'io.micrometer:micrometer-tracing-bridge-otel'
implementation 'io.opentelemetry:opentelemetry-exporter-otlp'

I am looking for an option to turn opentelemetry off without removing these dependencies and/or other settings. I have tried all the below options in both configmaps as well as application.yaml but still end up with some traces being sent:

configmap changes:

OTEL_SDK_DISABLED: "true" OTEL_JAVAAGENT_ENABLED: "false"

application.yaml chnges:

management: tracing: enabled: false sampling: probability: 0

But still getting this error in the logs. The jaeger collection is not up but i don't expect any traces to be sent from the server.

SEVERE: Failed to export spans. The request could not be executed. Full error message: jaeger-collector.default: Name does not resolve

Any other settings to be placed?
